SubmitOrderPromptDescription: Cart will be locked until payment is completed
UnableBackMenuDescription: You may only return to the menu once you <bold>completed your payment</bold>. Select ‘Pay Now’ to proceed.
OrderNotFoundDescription: Your order cannot be found. Please contact customer support if you wish to proceed.
SomeoneElseIsPayingDescription: Someone else on the table is checking out the order. Please try again later.
RefreshTableSummaryDescription: Some items in your group order has been added or removed.
